settings.subtitle: This Just in!
settings.title: Meet the LR1
settings.text: The original LongRun shoe: classic, simple, comfortable and sustainable. All you could ever want in a shoe.

settings.title: The Road to Accessibility
settings.text_1: Let's start from the absolute very beginning. The first shoe was invented 40,000 years ago, the very moment that defined the start of a booming industry made up of artists and engineers who have throughout the years, scaled the industry to the size it is today, so much so that we can’t bear to imagine our lives without shoes.
settings.text_2: Our founder Jerry, with his extensive knowledge and experience in the footwear industry is also very passionate about the environment and has become increasingly aware of the climate emergency that the world is facing today, so he set out on a mission to create a new sustainable shoe that would help solve this problem.
settings.text_3: He noticed that companies had already started to come out with sustainable footwear solutions BUT at relatively high prices. He believes however, that everyone should have access to a sustainable shoe because the more sustainable options there are out there, the less unsustainable options are purchased.

settings.subtitle: No Compromises
settings.title: Our Solution
settings.text:
Casual shoes that are natural and sustainable but affordable getting rid of the Green Premium once and for all.

Designed with maximal comfort in mind, so that you feel like you're walking on clouds! We also focused on a simplistic design to make them the perfect everyday casual shoe. On top of that? They’ll last you a heck of a long time so no need to throw them away as quick as other shoes. When you do though, no need to worry, they take X less time than typical shoes to biodegrade.

settings.subtitle: THE NAME
settings.title: Why "LongRun"?
settings.text: The name LongRun (‘lȯŋ-rən’) epitomizes our long-term commitment to sustainability through natural, ecologically-friendly materials and environmental responsibility. The forward drive to embrace solutions that preserve our planet is worth pursuing with unflinching resolve. When we make the right choices, we all win in the long run.

settings.subtitle: LongRun
settings.title: Who Are We?
settings.text: Hi! We're glad you found us. We are LongRun, a new Canadian shoe brand that puts the environment first. Our shoes are comfortable, simple and durable. Our shoes are accessible. Our shoes are taking their first steps into a world of sustainability without any compromises.

settings.title: Our Vision 👁
settings.text: In the grand scheme of things, we want everyone in the world to own a pair of sustainable shoes and we want to be the company that makes that happen.

settings.title: Our Mission 📢
settings.text: We want to develop and offer you a sustainable shoe that is affordable and accessible without compromising on comfort, style and durability.

settings.title: Our Purpose 💡
settings.text: In the end, what we want is to make the world a more eco-friendly place, one pair of shoes at a time.

settings.title: Our Commitments 🔓
settings.text:
We are committed to...

⚪ Being the most affordable and accessible eco-friendly shoe on the market.

⚪ Making sure that we do not compromise on comfort, style and durability in the creation of an eco-friendly and affordable shoe.

⚪ Working towards an 100% eco-friendly and biodegradable shoe that will close the loop on waste.

⚪ Continuously improving our supply chain logistics to become fully eco-friendly starting from the source all the way to the disposal.

⚪ Continuously finding new ways to reduce the environmental footprint of our shoes, whether it be finding new raw materials to use or by offsetting our carbon footprint to become carbon neutral and possibly carbon negative (climate positive) in the future.

⚪ Always being real and transparent about our every step in our process.

settings.title: Our Values 💗

settings.title: Keep Reading...
settings.text: Find out more about our Materials

Sustainability is at the forefront of everything that we do here at LongRun. Whether it be through our natural and recycled materials, eco-friendly supply chain, the highest ethical standards and certifications or our corporate culture and practices, we make sure that everything we do positively benefits our planet and our people.

settings.subtitle: PENDING
settings.title: B Corporation
settings.text: We are a certified Pending B-Corporation! This is a program put in place for conscious brands that haven’t been in operation for 1 year yet but are measuring and managing their social and environmental performance. By becoming a Pending B-Corporation, we have committed to meet the highest standards of verified social and environmental performance, public transparency, and legal accountability to balance profit and purpose.

settings.subtitle: GOALS
settings.title: Towards B Corporation
settings.text: In order to make sure we become an official B-Corporation, we have set goals based on the B-Impact Assessment and the SDGs and are working hard towards the achievement of these goals. As of now, we are on track to become an official B-Corporation in 2022.

SHOP NOW

Let's Talk LongRun                      Let's Talk Materials

settings.title:
Better for your feet
Better for the planet
Materials that are better for your feet and for the planet.
settings.text: We set out on a mission to find the best materials for your feet and the planet. That means natural plant-based materials that grow and renew quickly, that grow without chemicals or irrigation and are made into fabrics and materials in an eco friendly way. For smaller components, we made sure to use recycled materials. We also made sure that these materials benefit your feet by offering undeniable comfort, breathability and a light as a feather feel among many other features.
Bamboo          Sugarcane        Castor Bean Oil        Laces      Natural Rubber

settings.subtitle: Bamboo
settings.title: For the Planet
settings.text: Bamboo is one of the fastest growing plants on the planet, requiring just four years to reach maturity. Bamboo represents a revolutionary alternative to traditional wood. It grows 3 feet per day, exhibits extraordinary strength and resilience and requires little or no maintenance. Most importantly, it doesn’t need to be cut down when harvested so it can keep doing its thing and absorb toxic greenhouse gases and release oxygen into the air, 35% more than most trees to be exact.

settings.subtitle: BAMBOO
settings.title: MEET BAMBOOCEL™
settings.text: Meet Bamboocel™, a revolutionary new fabric that combines the sustainability of Bamboo with a completely benign manufacturing process, Lyocell. Bamboocel (bamboo + Lyocell) is a completely renewable bio-material made using the pulp of Bamboo which is blended with an organic solvent to create a cellulose fibre. This is then spun into yarn and woven into our proprietary fabric. This is an entirely closed-loop process because the water and solvent waste are constantly reused making this fabric the perfect combination of sustainable material and manufacturing.
Give me the Details!

settings.title: We didn't stop there...
settings.text_1: We wanted to make sure that the environmental footprint of our shoe was as small as possible so we also use a strobble board made from recycled plastic bottles, our eyelets are stitched to avoid extra plastic use, and all of our dyes, paints and glues are plant based or water based.
settings.text_2: Our shoe box, including the sleeve and insert, is made from 100% recycled and recyclable post-consumer cardboard that is FSC certified. The ink we use is plant based made from soy and our tape is brown reinforced water-activated tape which removes the need for chemical glue.

settings.text: Let's Talk Sustainability           Let's talk LongRun

settings.text_1: A simple way to help protect the planet is by donating to certified environmental charities. Here is our favourite.
settings.text_2: A great initiative to take part in to offset your own carbon footprint is to plant a tree. Each tree planted offsets x amount of carbon.
settings.text_3: This one is a bit more of a challenge but we think you can do it! Try to go zero waste for 1 whole week and don’t forget to record your journey and tag us @longrunshoes and use the hashtag #longrungoeszero

settings.title: Our Mission  📢
settings.text: Develop and offer a sustainable shoe at an affordable price so that everyone can do their part to make the world a better place while not having to break the bank to do so.

settings.title: Our Vision 👁
settings.text: In the grand scheme of things, we want everyone in the world to own a pair of sustainable shoes and we want to be the company that makes that happen.

settings.title: Our Purpose 💡
settings.text: In the end, what we want is to make the world a more Eco-friendly place, one pair of shoes at a time.

settings.subtitle: OUR MATERIALS
settings.title: The perfect balance
settings.text: We take pride in knowing that our shoes are made out of the best sustainable materials for your feet and for the planet.

settings.subtitle: our impact
settings.title: Sustainability
settings.text: Our shoes don't just sit on your feet and look pretty. Every pair has a positive impact on the environment and the world.
